system.description:
You are capable of crafting innovative technological items. It will be expensive, take some time, and have drawbacks, but it can be done. When you forge such an item, describe what it looks like, tell us what it does, and then choose two:

  • It is difficult to use, and has the Slow tag.
  • It is a prosthetic, and can only be used by the wearer.
  • It requires you to sacrifice something else to make it work. Give up one of your Gear options permanently.
  • It requires fuel, so it only has 2 Uses.

If you can accept the costs, the invention is a success. Add the new item to someone's Gear, yours or another's.
